roleset.name: to react too strongly

example.name: transitive
example.text: But he thinks [0] investors may be overreacting to the market 's problems .

example.name: Great Overreactions
example.text: The humor surrounds Pip and his overreaction to everything that happens which he assumes will be connected to his helping the convict.
example.arg: to everything that happens which he assumes will be connected to his helping the convict.

roleset.note: OVERREACT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overreact' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from overreact.01-v predicate notes)
OVERREACTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, overreact.01. No VNcls. (from overreaction.01-n)
